description: This quick and delicious air fryer recipe is perfect for an easy dinner. Think golden, crunchy, juicy chicken, fresh veggie ribbons and fluffy rice.
name: Japanese-style karaage chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 95 g McCormick Japanese style karaage chicken recipe base

recipeInstructions.text: Heat rice according to packet instructions. Divide rice, carrot, cucumber and chicken among plates. Drizzle veg with dressing, sprinkle over onion and serve.
